website_summaries.verdict: Low price for a helpful test prep book. Provides detailed test-taking strategies.
pros: Offers an area with detailed study materials and test taking ideas, as well as an area with a basic overview for those pressed for time
Focuses on test-taking strategies to have success with PSAT
Answers to practice test questions contain detailed explanations, helping you figure out your mistakes
cons: Typographical errors and some mathematical errors are off-putting

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY! Useless and nothing like  real PSAT 8/9
customer_reviews.text: Would give this zero stars if I could. The math was completely misleading and significantly easier than the real thing ( think 4th and 5th grade level). Same for the reading prep. Only the writing was somewhat decent but anyone who actually uses this book to prepare will be in for a very BIG shock when they take the real test. My child was only ok today when he took the PSAT 8/9 because he actually did some regular PSAT prep, in addition to using this ridiculous book. Unbelievable!
customer_reviews.author: RPD

customer_reviews.title: Good practice book, but identical to PSAT Prep 2018
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad practice book for the PSAT exam. It offers some test taking strategies and two practice tests. The contents of this book are identical, cover to cover, with the PSAT Prep 2018 book by same publisher. This is not fair business practice.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Prithviraj (Raj) Dasgupta

customer_reviews.title: many symbol displayed as black block
customer_reviews.text: there is a problem port this regular book to kindle edition . Many symbols did not scanned well and it display as a black block. This make many questions useless.
customer_reviews.author: Ariwan Rakvit

customer_reviews.title: Excellent study guide for PSAT 8/9
customer_reviews.text: My child now feels much more confident about the PSAT test after working through the sample questions and test taking tips in this book. And, after seeing sample questions and his ability to answer them, his parents are a little more confident too. If you have a teenager, you know what I mean! Note that this is the guide you want for the PSAT 8/9 - the PSAT/NMSQT is slightly different and more advanced. If you don't know which test your kid will take, check with your school.
customer_reviews.author: RUthatoneguy

customer_reviews.title: Not enough practice questions
customer_reviews.text: This book is very short. It gives good explanations and strategies/tips for each section of the test, but it hardly provides any practice. Very frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: anniemo

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter, who was preparing for the PSAT, entering into the 9th grade, and testing for the Magnet program, loved it! For those of us who didn't take weeks to prepare, this was a handy book to acclimate her during the week before the exam.
customer_reviews.author: D. Powell

customer_reviews.title: quick study guide
customer_reviews.text: This book is a comprehensive study guide to the 8/9 PSAT for my son. I especially like the full test questions with complete answers to explain where he needs to focus his studying. Bonus DVD is helpful. He'll be taking PSAT and SAT courses to boost his confidence and test taking skills, but this book was a good starting point to practice actual test questions and to familiarize himself with the format.
customer_reviews.author: Tara M

customer_reviews.title: Great test prep book
customer_reviews.text: So far we have learned a lot about how to "game the system", I mean take tests. It is sad that I have to teach my child how to do this rather than focus on comprehension of a subject. This PSAT prep book is helping though, practice scores have improved. Yay. System win.
customer_reviews.author: J. Pichcuskie

customer_reviews.title: WONDERFUL STUDY GUIDE!!
customer_reviews.text: The guide is really helpful to my daughter! It is easy to understand and thoroughly explains things to her to where she can understand it and break it down. She does not feel as overwhelmed as she has in the past. It has helped her gain more confidence in herself. Get this guide...you won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: TaylorS01

customer_reviews.title: Can Help..
customer_reviews.text: I bought this book to help aid my daughter with her studies and she said that it was nothing significant, but it did help her to prep for her test.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Study guide
customer_reviews.text: Study guide is great. It provides lots of strategies for the test prep and exposes students with lots of strategies. I bought this test prep book for my daughter and she finds it quite helpful.
customer_reviews.author: anjana kapoor

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is going into 8th grade. She used this book for studying over the summer and it got her prepared for 8th grade.
customer_reviews.author: Annie Zhang

customer_reviews.title: Good study guide if you're pressed for time
customer_reviews.text: I think this is a good study guide. It's not overwhelming with too much information and the explanations are clear and concise. We just found out that the school district changed the test date from Dec to October, and changed the test to PSAT 8/9, not leaving us with a lot of time to prepare for this newly administered test, so this workbook was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Lia

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Study Book
customer_reviews.text: This study guide was really helpful when it came to giving testing suggestions and going over the basics. Unlike most study guides, this one was straightforward and comprehensible. I was really productive during my study time using this book. In the end, I was able to learn a lot and feel confident in taking the PSAT 8-9.
customer_reviews.author: Jahangir Iqbal

customer_reviews.title: Great test prep.
customer_reviews.text: Overall this is a great test prep. It’s allows me to focus on specific parts of the exam to help my daughter master the skills she is struggling in. Compact and very easy and to read. My only suggestion would be to include the skill a specific practice question is testing for.
customer_reviews.author: Renika Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: Very Helpful Resource
customer_reviews.text: I think the study guide is concise but covers key concepts and PSAT test taking strategies that i think will improve the score of my child
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome book
customer_reviews.text: so far I think the book is working for my daughter as long as she continues to study. I like the book because it’s been Relative to what she needs to know.
customer_reviews.author: Richm

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: It's a good book to use to study for the past. If It has tests that help you see how your skills have developed and answers with explanations.
customer_reviews.author: kim white

customer_reviews.title: PSAT 8/9 Prep Book
customer_reviews.text: The book seems complicated compared to the HSPT book. It does not have enough practice pages included either.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recommend!!
customer_reviews.text: It helps and give good idea about patterns and questions.
customer_reviews.author: UMESH

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: The book was pretty good. My kids learned from it.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonMember

customer_reviews.title: Information seems helpful!
customer_reviews.text: My son worked quickly through the book and feels that it includes helpful information. After he takes the PSAT 8/9 in April 2019, I will update the review to reflect his opinion regarding how well the book helped him prepare.
customer_reviews.author: Melisha

customer_reviews.title: This book has been very helpful preparing for the PSAT 8/9
customer_reviews.text: This book is easy to understand and the practice questions have enabled me to focus on any weaknesses I have.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Raymond

customer_reviews.title: Great Book
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the amount of explanation before each section that clarified test-taking strategies, and the common themes in a question. It definitely helped me prepare for the PSAT 8/9!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: It is very good
customer_reviews.text: This book is very good in helping me about the do's and dont's about test-taking for the PSAT 8/9
customer_reviews.author: Anya

customer_reviews.title: Helpful Test Prep
customer_reviews.text: I liked that the book had explanations for each test answer. I would have liked for the book to include a real bubble in answer sheet, similar to the one on the real test.
customer_reviews.author: April Yates

customer_reviews.title: PSAT 8/9 Study Guide
customer_reviews.text: I really like this book because the questions and passages taught me more knowledge, and it helped me build up my confidence towards the upcoming PSAT this year.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Concise and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Overall good presentation. It was easy to absorb the ideas in the book. The text is concise and well written so that it is rapid to read.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Haskett

customer_reviews.title: Great PSAT workbook
customer_reviews.text: Me and my kids really love these test prep workbooks.
customer_reviews.author: Taehoon

customer_reviews.title: Great book for prep.
customer_reviews.text: I think this study guide will help me achieve a greater score. I’m going for the Top 10% this year I would also love a premium pen please.
customer_reviews.author: asher shahzad

customer_reviews.title: Helpful
customer_reviews.text: This book was very informative on the logistics of the test. It was very instructive regarding the content of the exam.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous too

customer_reviews.title: Great book
customer_reviews.text: Brought the book for my daughter in the 8th grade. Book is detailed. Love the practice test and explanations.
customer_reviews.author: Terance Bell

customer_reviews.title: Test prep
customer_reviews.text: My daughter finds it very useful to prepare for the test and practice questions.
customer_reviews.author: DVK

customer_reviews.title: Great study material
customer_reviews.text: This book is the perfect study guide for an 8th grade student preparing to take the 8/9 psat!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good study guide
customer_reviews.text: I liked the throrough explanations of all the subjects, but I thought there should have been more practice questions for the three sections.
customer_reviews.author: Zzz

customer_reviews.title: Good Prep Book
customer_reviews.text: The practice test and answer explanation were very good. I hope that these tests will help to succeed.
customer_reviews.author: Pankaj Singh

customer_reviews.title: Good book
customer_reviews.text: Overall good book. Having some more basic covered in the instruction will be good
customer_reviews.author: Muthu

customer_reviews.title: The practice tests after each section were very useful and gave us a baseline understanding of potential performance
customer_reviews.text: The guide and instructions were very clear and understandable. The practice tests after each section were very useful and gave us a baseline understanding of potential performance. We would have preferred to have an entire PSAT test (thus 4 out of 5 starts) to assess the actual time at the end of the guide. However, the guide, even without a full PSAT, is still very useful
customer_reviews.author: Llama

customer_reviews.title: Preparation
customer_reviews.text: This book was valuable in preparing my 8th grade students for the PSAT8.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie N.

product_meta.title: PSAT 8/9 Prep Books 2018 & 2019: Test Prep Reading, Writing, & Math Workbook and Practice Test Questions
